content: Is there a way/feature to setup a type of message that is displayed within a stream similar to IRC channels?
...or will there be a feature added at some point if it does not currently exist?
Sounds similar to the stream description to me. For example, the description of this stream is "Get help installing or running Zulip in production."
@Austin Riba , ok. I noticed that feature but it doesn't post to the stream like in IRC. I guess users can simply check the description manually. Appreciate the reply.
Hmm, that is a nice idea though: to echo the description when it’s changed.
Does that appear in the stream events topic?

Austin Riba said:

Hmm, that is a nice idea though: to echo the description when it’s changed.

We actually started doing that in Zulip 5.0. So @gl2k000 users will see a notification when stream descriptions are modified.
@Tim Abbott, that's great! Thank you!
